name: Retro Runner 85
description:
STORY (KIND OF) The year is 1985 and a brand new game called Retro Runner has been released.
You have your parents run you to video store where you grab the game and take it home. If only you knew the pain and suffering that was to come!
You pop the game in and begin to play......minutes before you destroy the controller.

FEATURES:
-Endless Gameplay
-Stunning Retro Visuals
-Easy Controls
-Challenge
-Hours Of Music
-Free!

This game is EA so it is not 100% finished and may get updates. The game does not contain any cut scenes or any fancy new stuff you see in games today. The game is a endless runner that is only meant to push a real true gamer to the limits. The goal is to get the highest score against your friends. RR is not a online multiplayer that would not make since. However you play and share your score and have your friends try to beat it. 
The game is EXTREMELY HARD! and takes serious gaming skills to get the best scores. 

I created this to give a retro old school feeling and bring back something that is dying....The high score.
